mapper.select: SELECT comments.comment_id AS commentId, comments.post_id AS postId, comments.user_id AS userId, users.user_name AS userName, users.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, comments.company_id AS companyId, comments.comment_content AS commentContent, comments.comment_register_time AS commentRegisterTime, comments.comment_referenced_id AS commentReferencedId FROM comments comments LEFT OUTER JOIN users users ON comments.user_id = users.user_id WHERE comments.comment_referenced_id = #{commentReferencedId} LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
